description: This stores the accession numbers associated with the order.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for this table as determined by the number of accession numbers associated with an order.

columns.name: ACC_NUM
columns.description: The accession number associated with an order.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_APP_IDN
columns.description: The specimen application ID number associated with an order.
